query.select: ( SELECT COUNT(O2.ID) + 1 FROM OPERATION O2 WHERE O2.TRIP_FK = O.TRIP_FK AND O2.ID <> O.ID AND COALESCE(O2.FISHING_START_DATE_TIME, O2.START_DATE_TIME) < COALESCE(O.FISHING_START_DATE_TIME, O.START_DATE_TIME) )
(SELECT CASE VUM.NUMERICAL_VALUE WHEN 1 THEN 'Normal' WHEN 0 THEN 'Anormal' ELSE null END FROM VESSEL_USE_MEASUREMENT VUM WHERE VUM.OPERATION_FK=O.ID and VUM.PMFM_FK=&tripProgressPmfmId)

(SELECT QV.LABEL || ' - ' || (CASE QV.LABEL when '0' then 'calme, vagues absentes' when '1' then 'ridée, vagues de 0 à 0.1 mètres' when '2' then 'belle, vagues de 0.1 à 0.5 mètres' when '3' then 'peu agitée, vagues de 0.5 à 1.25 mètres' when '4' then 'agitée, vagues de 1.25 à 2.5 mètres' when '5' then 'forte, vagues de 2.5 à 4 mètres' when '6' then 'très forte, vagues de 4 à 6 mètres' when '7' then 'grosse, vagues de 6 à 9 mètres' when '8' then 'très grosse, vagues de 9 à 14 mètres' when '9' then 'énorme, vagues de 14 mètres et plus' END) FROM VESSEL_USE_MEASUREMENT VUM INNER JOIN QUALITATIVE_VALUE QV ON QV.ID=VUM.QUALITATIVE_VALUE_FK WHERE VUM.OPERATION_FK=O.ID and VUM.PMFM_FK=&seaStatePmfmId )
(SELECT CAST(ROUND(VUM.NUMERICAL_VALUE) AS INTEGER) FROM VESSEL_USE_MEASUREMENT VUM WHERE VUM.OPERATION_FK=O.ID and VUM.PMFM_FK=&mainWaterDepthPmfmId)
(SELECT CAST(ROUND(VUM.NUMERICAL_VALUE) AS INTEGER) FROM VESSEL_USE_MEASUREMENT VUM WHERE VUM.OPERATION_FK=O.ID and VUM.PMFM_FK=&mainFishingDepthPmfmId)
(SELECT PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE FROM PHYSICAL_GEAR_MEASUREMENT PGM WHERE PGM.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK=PG.ID and PGM.PMFM_FK=&meshSizePmfmId)
(SELECT CAST(ROUND(PGM.NUMERICAL_VALUE) as INTEGER) FROM PHYSICAL_GEAR_MEASUREMENT PGM WHERE PGM.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK=PG.ID and PGM.PMFM_FK in (&effortPmfmIds) )
COALESCE((SELECT 'Oui' FROM PHYSICAL_GEAR_MEASUREMENT PGM WHERE PGM.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK=PG.ID and PGM.PMFM_FK=&selectionDevicePmfmId), 'Non')
(SELECT QV.NAME FROM PHYSICAL_GEAR_MEASUREMENT PGM INNER JOIN QUALITATIVE_VALUE QV ON QV.ID=PGM.QUALITATIVE_VALUE_FK WHERE PGM.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK=PG.ID and PGM.PMFM_FK=&selectionDevicePmfmId)
( SELECT CASE count(*) WHEN 1 THEN 'Oui' ELSE 'Non' END FROM PHYSICAL_GEAR_MEASUREMENT PGM WHERE PGM.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK=PG.ID and PGM.PMFM_FK=&acousticDeterrentDevicePmfmId )
(SELECT QV.NAME FROM PHYSICAL_GEAR_MEASUREMENT PGM INNER JOIN QUALITATIVE_VALUE QV ON QV.ID=PGM.QUALITATIVE_VALUE_FK WHERE PGM.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK=PG.ID and PGM.PMFM_FK=&acousticDeterrentDevicePmfmId)
CASE WHEN B.ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Oui' ELSE 'Non' END
(SELECT VUM.NUMERICAL_VALUE FROM VESSEL_USE_MEASUREMENT VUM WHERE VUM.OPERATION_FK=O.ID and VUM.PMFM_FK in (&gearSpeedPmfmIds) )
query.from: INNER JOIN OPERATION O ON O.TRIP_FK = T.TRIP_CODE
LEFT OUTER JOIN METIER M ON M.ID = O.METIER_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN PHYSICAL_GEAR PG ON PG.ID = O.PHYSICAL_GEAR_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN GEAR G ON G.ID = PG.GEAR_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN TAXON_GROUP TG ON TG.ID = M.TAXON_GROUP_FK
LEFT OUTER JOIN BATCH B ON B.OPERATION_FK = O.ID AND B.PARENT_BATCH_FK IS NULL
LEFT OUTER JOIN VESSEL_POSITION P_START ON P_START.OPERATION_FK = O.ID and P_START.DATE_TIME=COALESCE(O.FISHING_START_DATE_TIME, O.START_DATE_TIME)
LEFT OUTER JOIN VESSEL_POSITION P_END ON P_END.OPERATION_FK = O.ID and P_END.DATE_TIME=COALESCE(O.FISHING_END_DATE_TIME, O.END_DATE_TIME)
